data type: 	float

columns:	360
rows:	180
ref. system:	lat/long
ref. units:	deg
min. X:	-180
max. X:	180
min. Y:	-90
max. Y:	90
pos'n error:	unknown

max. value:	35.000900
value units:	PSS
value error:	see error file
